/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
